targets.query:
from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with AnomalyPercent: r.Anomaly_ratio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])
  |> yield(name: "BS1")

from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with AnomalyPercent: r.Anomaly_ratio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])
  |> yield(name: "BS2")

  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS11")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with AnomalyPercent: r.Anomaly_ratio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])
  |> yield(name: "BS11")

from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS12")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])
  |> yield(name: "BS12")

from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS13")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with AnomalyPercent: r.Anomaly_ratio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])
  |> yield(name: "BS13")

from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with AnomalyPercent: r.Anomaly_ratio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])

from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibVelolAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with AnomalyPercent: r.Anomaly_ratio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])

import "experimental/aggregate"

stream = from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ContactTemperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: last, createEmpty: false)


temperature = stream
  |> map(fn: (r) => ( { r with Temperature: r._value }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value", "_start", "_stop", "_field", "_measurement", "SensorName"])
  |> yield(name:" temperature")
 
rateofchange = stream
  |> aggregate.rate (every: 1m, unit: 1m)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ( { r with RateOfChange: r._value * 1.0 }))
  |> drop(columns: ["_value", "_start", "_stop"])
  |> yield(name: "rate")

from(bucket: "${Correlation_Bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibrationsCorrelation" and r.SensorName == "BS1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MaxCoeff")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS1")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "RMS_total" or r["_field"] == "Avg_model" or r["_field"] == "Std_model" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with PLus3Std: r.Avg_model  + 3.0 * r.Std_model} )  )
  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with Minus3Std: r.Avg_model  - 3.0 * r.Std_model} )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Std_model"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with AnomalyPercent: r.Anomaly_ratio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])

from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibVelolAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with AnomalyPercent: r.Anomaly_ratio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])

import "experimental/aggregate"

stream = from(bucket:"${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)

temperature = stream

rateofchange = stream

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "MaxCoeff")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

from(bucket: "${Process_Bucket}" )
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "RMS_total" or r["_field"] == "Avg_model" or r["_field"] == "Std_model" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with PLus3Std: r.Avg_model  + 3.0 * r.Std_model} )  )
  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with Minus3Std: r.Avg_model  - 3.0 * r.Std_model} )  )

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "RMS_total" or r["_field"] == "Avg_model" or r["_field"] == "Std_model" )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 10ms, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with PLus3Std: r.Avg_model  + 3.0 * r.Std_model} )  )
  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with Minus3Std: r.Avg_model  - 3.0 * r.Std_model} )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Std_model"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "VibAccelAnalytics" and r.SensorName == "BS7")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Anomaly_ratio")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

  |> map (fn: (r) =>  ( { r with AnomalyPercent: r.Anomaly_ratio * 100.0 } )  )
  |> drop(columns: ["Anomaly_ratio"])
